articals.title: Our Strength
articals.description: Divine Public School ensures acedemic excellence, character building and leadership skills which help allround development of a student.  Easily accessible location for families to come the well trained and professional staffs.

articals.title: Why DPS
articals.description: Divine Public chool emphasizes on the all-round development of the learners and accentuates the blending of co-curricular and extracurricular activities into the learner’s curriculum and monitors overall progress.

articals.title: Academic
articals.description: Our School is renowned for its outstanding academic offerings, acknowledged teachers, and supportive environment, cultivates a desire to study in students, enabling them to succeed both academically and personally.

articals.title: Activity
articals.description: Engaging in extracurricular activities in school is a great way to nurture student’s hidden talents. Divine Public School ensures that the students are utilizing the time effectively. Education helps to develop a balance between a sound mind and a healthy body.
